summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley dated October 16, 2009. In the email, Epstein apologizes for not responding the previous night, mentioning that he had a sultan and a person associated with Putin at his location. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his recent interactions with notable individuals.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on October 16, 2009.
Epstein mentions having a sultan and a person associated with Putin at his location.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
